title: What you get in the Project boxes.
body:
The first Strike + bundle gives you all 3 skins + 1 gemstone.
Also gives you I think 10-15 Project boxes (Like the normal ones) But DO NOT NEED KEYS.
and they act like normal boxes apart form giving you 2 cores (Needed for the icons)

Now the Augment cache, gives you some of those IP boxes that you can buy without RP, which gives you the icons and act one again like normal boxes that don't need keys.

Do not buy it, unless you want the 10 gemstones, just spend IP instead.
It is not worth it otherwise I think.

replies.body:
I got a gemstone from my Augment Cache :D!!! 

Just need to open another 89984767847 chests to get 9 more gemstones for Soulstealer Vayne....

I'm currently sitting on 8 gemstones. :(

I think i'll buy the daily bundles to get the remaining 2 gemstones. I'll get 20 skins shards + 20 others loot + 20 project cores. 

At this point, its worth it. :)
Damn, where did you get all your gemstones xD. Do you spend money on chests are are you like the luckiest person to ever live 0_o?

I spent some money on chests when they first came out, and opened up 5. 

Since the promotion has come out, i've been really lucky and gathered another 3 hehe.

You getting Soulstealer Vayne or Hextech Annie?

Or ten Hextech chests and keys... Hehe kappa

I'm not sure between the 2 skins! 

I feel like Annie has the better skin, but i play Vayne more often. SO DIFFICULT!
